Ngl i was pretty sceptical about this game at first. However, after 6 hours straight I can tell this game is fire! Open world looks and feels really good. You got shit tons of bots and real players all around the map and it looks alive as hell. Especially after diving in the mass race of 60+ people, pure chaotic fun. 

Also, I bought the game originially also because of the skating in it. It's not the greatest skate controls, but it feels somewhat like a mix of skate and tony hawk games. 

There are also some nice cosmetics to be unlocked for free though, like vans shoes and pants w tshirts, however they are locked behind grindy currency which unlocks with progressing. Still, some of the cool stuff, like skateboarding in general or bmx campagin is locked by dlc paywall. Same goes for longboard. 

Would I reccomend? If you're looking for stunning visuals chill (and sometimes competetive) game with shit tons of cool riding and flying sports in it, hell yeah. Though, keep in mind, to get the skateboard you have to get skate edition. (all the other stuff except dirt bike and longboard is unlocked in the base game too).

I have only played a little bit of it but I am enjoying it so far, it is a Ubisoft game so its got the typical structure they use. The mass races are very fun and just complete chaos I can see it might get repetitive though, overall nearly 2 hours played and enjoying it.
